title: New: Teen Brains – Flume
content:
I first came across Norwich’s Teen Brains a few months back and instantly fell for the washed out sound of Annabel and it’s lovely surf pop aesthetic. The have now followed it up with an equally great track that solidifies them as one of my favourite finds of the year. Flume is another short and sweet slice of hazy pop and sounds not too dissimilar to the dream like sounds of Brooklyn’s DIIV.

It’s fuzzed out guitars and reverb drenched production doesn’t let up for the entirety of the track and makes a brief 2 minute track drift through your head for a whole lot longer. Stream it below:
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d46
